channel.title: Welcome! on Ayooluwa
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome! on Ayooluwa

item.title: Donor Prediction Challenge(click here to explore)
item.description: Github repo Tasks: Identify, based on historical data, the likely donors amongst a list of prospects. Extract insights on the most profitable demographics to target Challenges: Messy and imbalanced dataset Tricks: Data Cleaning Log transformation Undersampling Tools: Python(Numpy, Pandas, Seaborn)

item.title: Electricity prediction- Time Series Forecasting Project (click here to explore)
item.description: Github repo Tasks: Forecasted energy consumption over a given period Created a dashboard for customers to view their historical energy usage Challenges: Was my first time working with a time series dataset. Took some time to figure it out Tricks: Used location clusters and Acorn classification to engineer new features Tools: Python(Numpy, Pandas, Seaborn) SARIMA models Tensorflow(Keras backend) for LSTM Voila (dashboard for visualization)

item.title: Loan Prediction (click here to explore)
item.description: Github repo Tasks: Create classification framework to categorize customers Predict customers’ loan performance Challenges: Imbalanced dataset with outliers Tricks: Outlier removal Undersampling Tools: Python(Numpy, Pandas, Seaborn, Matplotlib) R

item.title: Beginner Tasks (click here to explore)
item.description: [Github repo] https://github.com/Ay-slim/Data-Science-Portfolio--Ayooluwa/tree/master/Practice_Lab_Submissions Tasks: Range from basic programming to implementing machine learning algorithms. Most of these were submitted as practice laboratory assignments and they include introductory datasets in Machine Learning such as MTCars and others. Challenges: Powering through the beginner learning curve Tricks: Stackoverflow Google Towards Datascience Geeks for Geeks Kaggle

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please drop me a message here and I’ll respond right away. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
